Module se1.bestellsystem

Package system

package system
Package with component classes for the "se1.bestellsystem".

The package provides public interfaces of system components and an access point to obtain references in the IoC interface.

Version:
"1.0.0-SNAPSHOT_C2"
Author:
"Hamza Hodzic"
  • Class
    Description
    Calculator
    Interface to calculate values.
    DatamodelFactory
    Factory that creates instances of objects of the datamodel package.
    Formatter
    Interface to convert values into readable String formats.
    IoC
    Interface of an "Inversion-of-Control" (IoC) container, which creates and holds system component objects.
    OrderBuilder
    OrderBuilder builds sample orders using objects from the datamodel package.
    Printer
    Interface to format and print objects and collections into a StringBuffer.
    TablePrinter
    Interface of configurable TablePrinter.
    TablePrinter.Builder
    Builder interface for constructing TablePrinter instances.
